    const TopLevelSym = Symbol();
    const InnerSym = Symbol();
    module.exports = {

        [TopLevelSym](x = 12) {
            return x;
        },
        items: {
            [InnerSym]: (arg = {x: 12}) => arg.x

==== index2.js (0 errors) ====
    const TopLevelSym = Symbol();
    const InnerSym = Symbol();
    
    export class MyClass {
        static [TopLevelSym] = 12;
        [InnerSym] = "ok";
        /**
         * @param {typeof TopLevelSym | typeof InnerSym} _p
         */
        constructor(_p = InnerSym) {
            // switch on _p
        }
    }
